title: Add DXGI_FORMAT_R10G10B10A2_SNORM
body:
There is already unsigned DXGI_FORMAT_R10G10B10A2_UNORM
and it would be great to have a signed version DXGI_FORMAT_R10G10B10A2_SNORM

comments.body: Vulkan has VK_FORMAT_A2R10G10B10_SNORM_PACK32, OpenGL has GL_INT_2_10_10_10_REV, and this type is supported by all of the major consoles' native graphics APIs (including the Xbox One's version of DXGI - DXGI_FORMAT_R10G10B10_SNORM_A2_UNORM) so hardware support is obviously there.
